summary: Tweaked Elys Community ini settings custom for T3nd0s SkyRe.
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does:
Now leveling is harder and more rewarding!
Level Cap: 81
It will now take more skill increases to raise your character by 1 level.
Perks per level: 2.5 (200 perks at level cap)
Skill cap: 150 (highest level required for any perk in SkyRe)
Also, this mod will make all skills level much slower except ones that leveled too slow (Wayfarer for example will level faster)
Encumbrance changes: You get 200 extra carrying capacity at level 2 and then get no more, regardless of attribute increases.
Attributes: 20 per level (health, stamina, magicka)

Required mod: Elys Community Uncapper (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175/?)
This is meant to be used for SkyRE (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?)

Recommendation: Do not use "legendary" status on any skill, let the cap be 81 after maxing all skills.

Installation: Extract into your Skyrim Installation Folder after installing Elys Uncapper and Skyre.
author: xjasko
